pr_title: fix: Hibernate exception when importing GML data [DHIS2-9714]

timeline.message: fix: Hibernate exception when importing GML data [DHIS2-9714]

timeline.bodyText:
I couple of questions:

Why Object? You say it can be Map<String, Object>, what is the reason for not doing it? Could it be Serializable (Since name is serializeableObject)?
Could it have a more descriptive name? To me, I think entity is a better name?
timeline.author: stian-sandvold
